title: Ziggs - Auto Attack bug
body:
Couldn't find where to report this, so throwing it out there.
As a Ziggs main I'm fairly confident and comfortable with Ziggs range and abilities (etc).
Over the past few games I've noticed that several of my Auto attacks and sometimes my q does not do any damage.
This is really bad when I proc his passive + lich bane and that next attack does nothing.

Please look into this :D

replies.body: This is a bug, and thus belongs on the [bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
